p: One of the structural derivatives of cyclobutene-dione [3-(phenylamino)-4-{[1,3,3-trimethyl-2,3-dihydro-1H-indol-2-ylidene]methyl}-cyclobut-3-ene-1,2-dione] 19 was chemically synthesized and was identified as the puissant inhibitor of the efflux pumps residing in plasma membrane - Major Facilitator Superfamily (MFS) and ATP-binding cassette (ABC) transporters accountable for efflux pump-mediated drug resistance in the fungal pathogen C. albicans ( Keniya et al., 2015).
